0.text: Bug 16613  "Name filter patterns" don't filter after relaunch.

1.text: Build: 20020519  In the packages view, I have created a Name filter pattern, "CVS*".

2.text: It filters all of my CVS junk that I don't want to see.

3.text: When I restart Eclipse, the filter is not applied.

4.text: If I open the Java Element Filters dialog and hit Ok, it is applied and my CVS folders are filtered.

13.text: Open Java Element Filters from triangle pulldown off of the packages view.

15.text: Enter CVS* as a Name filter pattern, hit OK.

20.text: Restart Eclipse, the packages view shows the CVS directory
